text: By the same token, this was the blank cheque Leavers signed for any form of leaving the EU. They can't complain about wanting a 'full exit' or 'Brexit in name only' or any such thing. It was quite clearly a vote on membership only and EEA, with all its flaws, ticks that box.
author: Jonnyhibberd

text: Won't be at the Peoples Vote March this time. Going to watch Stevenage at Macclesfield instead. I've sold my Sol.
author: Jonnyhibberd

text: Typical that Brextremists' only response to #RevokeArt50Now petition is to yell 'fake news'. In 3 years they've never had concrete coherent answers to anything and they fail to see that this is exactly why they are losing Brexit.
author: Jonnyhibberd

text: Hardly needs to be said, but Brexit looking like it was definitely happening was killing Nigel Farage's career, so he's secretly probably grateful for the renewed uncertainty.
author: Jonnyhibberd

text: The problem with the absurd 'Russian bots' rant about the #RevokeArt50Now petition is that the Remain side doesn't triangulate with Russia's aims or actions, which are to undermine the integrity of the EU, divide and conquer and get the EU sanctions over Crimea and Donbas stopped
author: Jonnyhibberd

text: Brilliant. Thanks.
